moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: It’s All about Focus!
moves.effect: Uses a maximum of three slots of the user’s move gauge. Based on the amount used, this move raises both the user’s Attack and Sp. Def by up to four stat ranks.

syncMove.name: All-about-Focus Avalanche
syncMove.description: The power of this move is increased during a hailstorm.

passives.name: Antifreeze
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

passives.name: Snow Shelter
passives.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from a hailstorm.
